General.Name: Jiangsu Yitong High-tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. develops and produces network equipment for the radio and television industry in China and internationally. The company provides front-end optical transmission equipment, optical workstations, optical transmission platforms, RF-PON products, optical transmitters, optical receivers, optical amplifiers, and other cable TV optical transmission equipment; and digital optical workstations, GEPON, ONU, MoCA, HomePlug and C-DOCSIS, and home gateway series products, as well as CATV coaxial cable transmission equipment, such as trunk amplifiers, passive components, and user terminals. It also offers intelligent monitoring engineering services for social security monitoring and weak electricity intelligent projects. In addition, the company provides design and system integration services, including feasibility studies, different program design, deepening design, project implementation, and operation and maintenance management services. Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changshu, China.
